With media publishing and telecasting irresponsibly, censorship is the need of the hour. Do you agree or disagree? Please elaborate with reasons and examples.

I agree.

Media is very useful in our day to day life. There are many kinds of media like print media, broadcast media, Television media social media etc. Publishing and telecasting doesn't mean only news channel, it may be publishing ads, telecasting serials, movies, programs etc.

In that different kinds of publishing we see some irresponsible programmes in media. Such programmes effects directly or indirectly on society and the impact of such effects is also more some time.

For example

News media telecasting news only on celebrities. In times of india, we can find many news links on celebrities. In that we find most of them is unwanted news and such kinds of news will have bad impact on society. We need censor on type of news.

Television programmes like Roadies, Big bosh,WWE etc. which use  very un parliament language and other valgour activities, such kinds of activities are strictly prohibited. Which impacts on society very much and cause severe lose to society.

There are many such  kinds of  programmes published daily in media. censer should be done on such kind of programmes.
